tool_description: An API showing  the top 350 Cryptocurrency Prices, Exchange rates and Market value
name: Cryptocurrency Live Update
title: Cryptocurrency Live Update

api_list.name: Get all the top 350 Cryptocurrency Exchange Rates and Prices
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the available top 350 Cryptocurrency Exchange rates.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-live-update.p.rapidapi.com/currencies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-live-update.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-live-update.p.rapidapi.com/currencies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-live-update.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
